html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-10662023-10-27PMO
ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
Financial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Designating the Minister for Small Business and Tourism (1) as the Designated Minister for the purposes of the Business Development Bank of Canada Act; and (2) as the appropriate Minister with respect to the Business Development Bank of Canada for the purposes of the Financial Administration Act
PrecisOrder (1) repealing P.C. 2019-1367 of November 20, 2019; (2) designating the MINISTER OF SMALL BUSINESS AND TOURISM, a member of the King's Privy Council for Canada, as the Designated Minister for the purposes of the Business Development Bank of Canada Act; and (3) designating the same minister as the appropriate Minister with respect to the Business Development Bank of Canada for the purposes of the Financial Administration Act.
